title: allofmp3.com
content:

title: Gah.
content:
If I want to buy music I'll go to a music store... if I want to download it I'll go to a torrent site. I'm not paying for pure data, athough I am inclined to donate to those offering their works for free. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Gah.
content:
i'm not saying you had to, besides US$10 (13.94 AUD) is a good deal especially 4 10 albums or 100 song downloads, it's much cheaper than going to a record shop, you can choose to burn them onto a cd (which is what i am goin' 2 to do) with the 3 iron maiden albums & 1 song i downloaded

7th son of a 7th son
no prayer for the dying
fear of the dark
judgement of heaven (the x factor)

it's your choice, i'm not forcing you 2 make 1 [url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/ironmaiden.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://simplythebest.net/fonts/fonts/font_downloads/iron_maiden.zip]Download the Iron Maiden font[/url]

title: Re: Gah.
content: I like ALLOFMP3 because I don't like CDs - I prefer to play music on my computer (being on it for long periods of time and all) and CDs tend to get stolen, scratched and discarded on the floor by my brother and sister. Also, BitTorrent eats up my monthly bandwidth quota pretty fast.

title: Re: Gah.
content:
You can buy Iron Maiden albums online or in real music stores for 8 $ and you''ll get great artwork, videos, and band bio's as a free bonus.

I really think it's crazy to pay for downloading because you also download copyprotection on real legal sites. When I buy legal cds I can extract the song from it as much as I want.-----------------

title: Re: allofmp3.com
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]ALLOFMP3 doesn't have copy protection - although it's technically only legal in Russia. (You can still use it legally
in most countries, though) [hr][/quote]
For the moment I'm afraid because we all know how copyright protection organizations look at such isseus.

[quote]Quote:[hr]i've never seen a maiden album 4 $8 in a record shop, besides i only downloaded them, cos my mum is pro-christain & thinks heavy metal is the work of the devil [hr][/quote]
You should try to order them online because real recordshops are very limited. Downloading the albums doesn't make them much less evil but all right let me try to help you here; Iron Maidens drummer Nico McBrain is a christian.
[url=http://www.godscare.net/witness/Iron%20Maiden.htm]Source 1[/url]
[url=http://www.guitarjams.net/mcbrain.html]source 2[/url]
Also Steve Harris himself respects christianity although he doesn't believe himself he wrote 'No more lies' more or less as a tribute to Jesus.
Maybe you should try to explain that to her although I don't give you much hope in succeeding.-----------------

title: Re: allofmp3.com
content: Well, there is new copyright legislation moving very slowly through Russian government - when that's passed, it'll be the end of ALLOFMP3. Luckily, Russian government is bloated and corrupt so it should take at least five years or so.
